column1: # Title: Deetman et al. (2021) methodology for calculating high, medium, and low voltage lines in the 26 IMAGE3.0 regions.

# Description: Deetman et al. compiled data on high voltage lines from various sources (OpenStreetMaps calculation by the authors for 2016), various national studies (2013-2017), and Arderne et al. (2019). From high voltage line length, they used ratios to calculate medium and low voltage lengths. The values used in Deetman et al. are used as inputs, while the rest of the data is preserved here for reproducibility.
# Source: Deetman et al. 2021 Resources, Conservation and Recycling https://doi.org/10.1016/j.resconrec.2020.105200

column3: km value used in Deetman et al.
column4: km Open Street Maps (calculation by Deetman et al.) 2016
